analysis.key_quote: The proposed regulations, if finalized, would DISMANTLE civil service protections, DESTABILIZE the career-workforce, POLITICIZE the day-to-day work of government, and ERODE the very idea of a professional, independent civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of the merit-based civil service system and the dangers of politicization, which aligns with concerns about maintaining employee rights and protections.
